name: FAMILIES AGAINST MANDATORY MINIMUMS (FAMM)
sampleDescriptions: Criminal justice reform, sentencing disparity, and the EQUAL Act

Equal Act - HR 1693 and S 79
Educational meetings about the existing crack-cocaine federal sentencing disparity.  Advocating for a most just and equal criminal justice system.
